chunks.title: NYLA Brand Voice Guidelines
chunks.body: NYLA brand voice emphasizes innovation, accessibility, and trust in AI-powered DeFi. Tone: Professional yet approachable, technically accurate but user-friendly. Key messages: AI democratizes DeFi access, non-custodial security, cross-chain interoperability. Avoid: Overly technical jargon, financial advice implications, competitive disparagement. Voice personality: Knowledgeable guide, innovative pioneer, trusted advisor. Use active voice, clear explanations, and inclusive language.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA brand guidelines emphasizing innovation, accessibility, and trust with professional yet approachable tone.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA品牌指导原则，强调创新、可及性和信任，采用专业而亲切的语调。

chunks.title: NYLA - The Venmo of Web3
chunks.body: NYLA is known as 'The Venmo of Web3' because the technology makes it simple to onboard newcomers to Web3 and distribute tokens to anyone using only their X username - no wallet address needed. This positioning emphasizes ease of use and accessibility, similar to how Venmo simplified peer-to-peer payments in traditional finance. The comparison resonates with mainstream users familiar with Venmo's user-friendly approach to money transfers.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA positioned as 'The Venmo of Web3' - simplifying token distribution using only X usernames, making Web3 accessible to newcomers.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA被定位为'Web3的Venmo' - 仅使用X用户名简化代币分发，让新手也能轻松进入Web3。

chunks.title: Multi-Platform Expansion Vision
chunks.body: NYLA can and will integrate with any platform that offers APIs, paving an obvious scaling path to additional normie-centric destinations like Reddit, Instagram, Discord, WeChat, and more. This multi-platform strategy positions NYLA as a universal Web3 interaction layer across social media platforms, not limited to X.com. The expansion vision targets mainstream social platforms where billions of users already spend their time, removing the need for users to learn new platforms or download special wallets.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA's multi-platform vision includes expansion to Reddit, Instagram, Discord, WeChat through API integrations, becoming a universal Web3 layer.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA的多平台愿景包括通过API集成扩展到Reddit、Instagram、Discord、微信，成为通用的Web3层。

chunks.title: Multi-Chain Support and Endorsements
chunks.body: NYLA is already live on Solana ($SOL), Ethereum ($ETH), and Algorand ($ALGO), and has been fully endorsed by the Algorand Foundation - a chain especially focused on strong technology. More blockchains will be added, unlocking new layers of active users and network effects. This multi-chain approach positions NYLA as a universal solution across different blockchain ecosystems, not tied to any single chain's limitations or user base.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA supports Solana, Ethereum, and Algorand with Algorand Foundation endorsement. More chains coming for expanded network effects.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA支持Solana、Ethereum和Algorand，获得Algorand基金会认可。更多区块链即将加入以扩大网络效应。

chunks.title: Multi-Lingual Support and Chinese Market
chunks.body: BONK leadership is rightfully bullish on the Chinese audience. In addition to English, the product commands work fully in Chinese, offering a native experience to that part of the world. The proof is in the pudding with the way NYLA works with @WangChaidotbonk as a PVE partner. Many other languages can and will be added to make the UX even more accessible globally. This multi-lingual approach removes language barriers for Web3 adoption.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA supports full Chinese language commands alongside English, with BONK partnership validation. More languages coming for global accessibility.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA支持完整的中文命令和英文，通过BONK合作伙伴关系验证。更多语言即将推出以实现全球可访问性。

chunks.title: NYLA Team Qualifications and Background
chunks.body: The NYLA team has an impressive background including 10-figure exits in the Web2 startup world, fintech & hedge fund engineering, presidential election data mining, and social intelligence engineering. The team comprises long-time cryptocurrency natives spanning BTC, ETH, and Solana since inception. Additionally, the team has been a strong supporter of $BONK, its leadership (@SolportTom, @iamkadense), and the broader ecosystem. This combination of Web2 success and Web3 nativity positions NYLA for mainstream adoption.
chunks.summary_en: NYLA team: 10-figure Web2 exits, fintech/hedge fund engineering, crypto natives since BTC/ETH/SOL inception, strong BONK supporters.
chunks.summary_zh: NYLA团队：Web2十位数退出、金融科技/对冲基金工程、自BTC/ETH/SOL开始的加密原生、强大的BONK支持者。

chunks.title: AI Project Valuation Comparisons
chunks.body: Last cycle, many AI projects with real tech and strong brands reached multi-hundred-million and billion-dollar valuations. NYLA is a 'this-cycle' coin, making it attractive as the next runner. Market comparisons: $Zerebro reached $821M (ATH), $AIXBT reached $916M (ATH), $AI16Z reached $2.73B (ATH), while $NYLA sits at just $7M today. This massive valuation gap compared to similar AI projects suggests significant growth potential for early supporters.
chunks.summary_en: AI project valuations: Zerebro $821M, AIXBT $916M, AI16Z $2.73B vs NYLA at $7M - showing significant growth potential.
chunks.summary_zh: AI项目估值：Zerebro 8.21亿美元、AIXBT 9.16亿美元、AI16Z 27.3亿美元，而NYLA仅700万美元 - 显示巨大增长潜力。
